text: Sergio Pesce (1916–1995) was an Italian cinematographer.Smith p.197 ==Selected filmography== * Macario Against Zagomar (1944) * The Ten Commandments (1945) * The Iron Swordsman (1949) * Twenty Years (1949) * Son of d'Artagnan (1950) * Free Escape (1951) * Love Song (1954) * The Mysteries of Paris (1957) * La sceriffa (1959) == References == == Bibliography == * Gary Allen Smith. Epic Films: Casts, Credits and Commentary on More Than 350 Spectacle Movies. McFarland, 2004. == External links == * Category:1916 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Italian cinematographers Category:People from Naples
title: Sergio Pesce
